attributes.additional_details:
RETIRED WORKERS & WORKING PEOPLE are TAXED on their INCOME above their Tax Allowance.
Those receiving BENEFITS (their INCOME) are NOT TAXED.
Government must start TAXING those BENEFITS as INCOME.
Provide ALL adults with a TAX ALLOWANCE regardless as to their work status.
ALSO deduct from source at least class 3 National Insurance from their BENEFITS if not working at all.  This will go towards the NHS running costs as we WORKERS do.
